english: My tongue is my enemy
ou can’t applaud with a sole hand
There is strength in unity
Strength can till the hill
A dog will not die from limping
Raise a child as an enemy - he will serve you as a friend
Show me the fear and I will show you an escape
Fear has big eyes
ntelligence is in the head, not in years

georgian: ხელი ხელსა ბანს, ორივე კი პირსაო
english: he hand washes a hand, together – a face

georgian: ხერხი ჯობია ღონესა, თუ კაცი მოიგონებსა
english: If a man can think of it, a trick is better than strength

georgian: ჯერ მწარე ჭამე კვლავ ტკბილი თუ ეძებ გემოვნებასა
english: If you are looking for a good taste, try bitter first and then sweet
A rolling stone gathers no moss

georgian: აგრე არ უნდა, თაყაო, შენ რომ მამული გაჰყაო
english: It’s not the correct way to divide land, Taya

georgian: აგურის ნატეხი ლალს შეუდარეს, აქაოდა წითელიაო
english: A piece of brick was compared to a ruby for its redness

georgian: ავადმყოფს ექიმი არჩენს, უბედურს კარგი მეგობარიო
english: A sick person is cured by a doctor and an unhappy person by a friend
An evil child defiles his parents

georgian: ათას უგულო მეგობარს, ერთი გულადი სჯობიაო
english: One warm-hearted friend is better than a thousand heartless friends

georgian: ლაგო, ვისი ხარო? – და ვინც ზედ მადგასო
english: Place, to whom do you belong? -To the one who is dwelling on me

georgian: ალვის ხე მაღალია, მაგრამ პატარა ცული წააქცევს
english: Even a small axe can cut down a high poplar (tree)

georgian: არ უშლის ხმალსა სიმოკლე, ვაჟკაცსა ტანდაბლობაო
english: he strength of the sword and the strength of the knight cannot be determined by size
Doing nothing is the biggest punishment for a hard worker
Don’t be afraid of death; be afraid of shame

georgian: გზა ვინც იცის, ფეხს არ წაჰკრავსო
english: One who knows the route will not stumble

georgian: დათვი შინდის ძირში წამოწვა: მალე რომ აყვავდება, ალბათ მალე დამწიფდებაო
english: A bear lay down under a cornel tree: “As it blooms soon, it will ripen quickly”
A great family requires great leadership
A timely planter gets a timely harvest
Dying valued is better than living with no purpose
Lies have short legs
There is always better than better
There is no smoke without fire
A sinless person does not exist
Color to color; thanks to God
The wind brought it and the wind will carry it (away)
You cannot make everyone pleased
Fire should not be brought close to hay

georgian: თუ გული გულობს, ქადა ორი ხელით იჭმევაო
english: If a heart is a real heart, a pie (ქადა) can be eaten with both hands

georgian: თუ თვალით არ დაინახო, ყურით გაგონილს ნუ დასდევო
english: If you don’t see something with your own eyes, don’t believe anything heard by your ears

georgian: თუ სარკე არ გაქვს, წყალში ჩაიხედეო
english: If you don’t have a mirror, look at yourself in the water

georgian: თუ წყვდიადი არ გინახავს, ფასს ვერ დასდებ სინათლესო
english: If you haven’t seen darkness, you won’t appreciate light
A good storyteller needs a good listener
Good friendship is the same as good brotherhood
A man’s eye is greedy
No one is ever finished with learning, even in old age
A foal skips on its surname
A humpback can be straightened only by the grave
A person in a rush can be the last
Having genuine intention means half the job is done

georgian: ვინც პატარა რამეს ვერ დააფასებს, ის ვერც დიდის ფასს მიხვდებაო
english: He who cannot appreciate a little thing cannot understand the value of a big one
You can’t jump over your own head
jug cannot always bring water

georgian: ლეკვი ლომისა სწორია, ძუ იყოს თუნდა ხვადია
english: The cub is equal to the lion, no matter the gender
He who tells the truth has many enemies
The full man thinks that the hungry man is full too
To my legs!
Chinese alphabet
He/She has a bird’s heart

georgian: ავი ძაღლი არც თვითონ ჭამს და არც სხვას აჭმევსო
english: An evil dog who cannot (or does not) eat precludes others from eating

georgian: ათასი ჭკვიანი მტერი სჯობია ერთ უმსგავსო მოყვარესა.
english: Having a thousand enemies is better than having one bad friend or relative
The heart’s rose
The heart’s narrowing
The scratch of a heart
There is satisfaction
To put the tail on the roof
Make the throat wet
Take something close to your ears
You can’t chop onion on my ears!
Ready ears
To cut ears

georgian: ის ურჩევნია მამულსა, რომ შვილი სჯობდეს მამასა
english: It’s good for the homeland if the son is better than the father

georgian: კაი კაცს ბევრი ეპატიჟება, ცუდს – არავინო
english: A good man is invited by all, a bad man by none
A good child is the rose of her mother’s heart
One man is another’s medicine

georgian: კაცს კაცი უნდა გერქვას, თორემ ულვაში კატასაც აქვსო
english: A man must act as a man [not just look like one], otherwise even a cat has a moustache.
Silence is confirmation
I prefer to have eggs today rather than a hen tomorrow
Snow will come to the door of the man who waited
The tongue has no bones
The country was not built in a day
Measure ten times and cut once
Forbidden fruit is sweeter
A fish in turbid water is easier to catch
It is not so much thundering as it is raining

georgian: აქლემის ქურდი და ნემსის ქურდი- ორივე ქურდიაო
english: The thief of a camel and thief of a needle are both thieves

georgian: ახალი ცოცხი კარგად გვის, ძველი მოიტანს ქვიშასა
english: The new broom sweeps well, the old one brings sand
The child’s mouth speaks truth
Much speaking, much headache

georgian: ბევრი ვეცადე შენთვისო, ძლივს გამივიდა ჩემთვისო
english: I did my best for you, but it hardly turned out for me
While wanting a lot one will lose the little he/she owns
Don’t worry too much, or you will grow old quickly
For the blockheaded, there are no laws
Postponed work is of the devil
The mediator takes most of the hits

georgian: გარედან მტერს უბრმავებს თვალებს, შიგნიდან მოყვარესაო
english: It blinds the eyes of the enemy from the outside, the eyes of beloved people from the inside
A man in trouble will enter the sea

georgian: გველსა ხვრელით ამოიყვანს ენა ტკბილად მოუბარიო
english: The snake can be lifted from the hole by the sweetly spoken tongue

georgian: გული გულს იცნობს და სული სულსაო
english: The heart will recognize the heart and the soul, the soul
A man who sows on time, reaps on time
A bridge as thin as a hair
To pour mud on a person’s head
It is not shown to the evil eye
He or she deserves it
That person was born while the luckiest star was shining
To sit in a buffalo’s horn
A stick where a mother hen is tied
The hat of honesty
A black-faced person
A light-faced person
To remain surprised
To throw stones at someone
To gather every man with a hat
Sugar to your mouth
The winery of St. Shio
A person does not like something, does not think of it.
To throw ash in the eye
It went into one ear, came out the other
To throw a pea against the wall

georgian: მადლი ქენი, ქვაზე დადე, გაიარე, წინ დაგხვდება
english: Do kind work, put it on a stone, walk away and it will meet you

georgian: მოყვარეს პირში უძრახე, მტერს პირს უკანაო
english: Tell your friend directly (even if the news is negative) and speak of bad news behind the back of your enemy

georgian: არ ცდება ის, ვინც არაფერს აკეთებს
english: The one who does not do anything makes no mistakes
She scratches her back with her tongue
He scratches the bottom of his foot with his tongue
He can pull the raven from the tree with his tongue
Eyes can eat and drink
Give me a hand
Give me your back
Looking eye to eye
Carries with the palm of the hand
To give some water to the eyes to drink
To make the heart watery
It eats my brain
It can’t bite my legs
It cannot deprive me of much
Running with a torn hat
He has a pulled waist
Now it is power beyond your head

georgian: ადრე ამდგომსა კურდღელსა ვერ მოეწევა მწევარი
english: No one can chase down an early rising rabbit
To beat up someone who inquires about someone else’s business

georgian: დედა ნახე, მამა ნახე, შვილი ისე გამონახე
english: Look at the mother, look at the father, find the child

georgian: ვისაც სროლა ვასწავლე, პირველი იმან დამიმიზნაო
english: I am targeted by the one whom I taught how to shoot

georgian: ერთი თხილის გული ცხრა ძმამ გაიყო
english: Nine brothers divided one nut
A fire cannot be hidden in hay
He who is lazy cannot be happy
A mouse dug, dug and dug out a cat
The door opens to those who knock

georgian: გონიერი კაცი ქვეყანას ააშენებს, უგუნური ქვეყნის ბარგია
english: The educated woman will build the nation, the uneducated are only a burden

georgian: არა შეჯდა მწყერი ხესა, არა იყო გვარი მისი
english: A quail was not able to go to a tree, because it was not in her last name

georgian: ზღვა ისე არ დაშრება, გუბის ტოლა არ დარჩესო
english: The sea may dry considerably, but it will still remain a pond
The fish rots from its head

georgian: თორმეტ კბილს რომ სიტყვა გამოსცდება, თორმეტ მთას გადაივლისო
english: Be careful with what you say

georgian: კაცს საქმე გამოსცდის და ცხენს გზაო
english: The man is examined by his work – and the horse by the road
You should welcome your guests according to their behavior

georgian: მტერმა მტრის ამბავი თუ იცის, მასთან ბრძოლა არ გაუძნელდებაო
english: If the enemies know each other, the battle will not be hard

georgian: მტერს მტრულად დაუხვდი და მოყვარეს მოყვრულადო
english: Hostile enemies met, and loving lovers

georgian: ოფოფს თავით იცნობენ, კარგ საქმეს ბოლოთიო
english: You can recognize a Hoopoe (type of bird) by its head, and a good job by its ending
Without the tongue, honesty speaks for itself
What you do not deserve will not be yours in the end

georgian: სადაც არ გიხნავს, იქ ვერას მოიმკიო
english: You cannot reap that which you have not plowed

georgian: როცა სიტყვა ხშირდებაო, მაშინ საქმე მცირდებაო
english: The more words, the less work
Greatness comes from loyalty to the homeland, not familial origins

georgian: საცა სიყვარული არ არის, იქ სიხარულს რა უნდაო
english: Where there is no love, there will be no joy
It is better to break your head than your reputation

georgian: სიბრძნე ებრძვის სიბრიყვესა უთოფოდ და უზარბაზნოდ
english: Wisdom fights against madness without any weapons
The seeds of truth will always grow, even on the steep rock
A conscience does not have teeth, though it still bites
Lies live till morning, whereas truth lasts to your grandchildren
Mushrooms rise with the weather

georgian: სოფელს დიდი თვალი და ყური აქვსო
english: A village has a keen eye and ear
It is easy to pluck weeds and thorns by other’s hands
The immoral man was spat on and he said “ip ip”!

georgian: ფურთხის ღირსი ხარო; შემაფურთხეთ რაო, მეც ავიწევ კალთას და ჩამოვიწმენდო
english: They said to the dishonest person that he deserved to be spat upon, he replied “Spit on me, I’ll take the edge of my shirt and wipe it away.”

georgian: როგორც ჟანგი ჭამს რკინას, ისე დარდი ჭამს გულს
english: As rust eats iron, grief eats the heart
Misfortune does not show its eye

georgian: ფუფუნებაში გაზრდილი არც თავს არგებს, არც სხვასაო
english: Anyone who was raised in luxury is neither for themselves nor for others
If you seed the wind, you will reap the storm

georgian: მდიდრის კატას ტიროდნენ და ღარიბისას კაცსაც არა
english: The people cried over the rich man’s cat, ignoring the death of the pauper’s brother
